QuestData.Title: Magisters' Terrace
QuestData.Description: We recently sent in an expeditionary force to the Magisters' Terrace to stop the Legion forces there.$B$BHowever, we haven't heard from them since, and I fear the worst.$B$BWill you go there and try to find Exarch Larethor? He's in charge of the expedition.
QuestData.LogDescription: Captain Theris Dawnhearth wants you to find Exarch Larethor inside the Magisters' Terrace.
QuestData.RewardText: Dawnhearth thought we were dead? Hah!$B$BI haven't sent a report because we haven't made any progress past this point.$B$BPerhaps you can help us change that?
